text: Cratena pilata is a species of sea slug, an aeolid nudibranch, a marine gastropod mollusc in the family Facelinidae.MolluscaBase (2018). Cratena pilata (Gould, 1870). Accessed on 2018-02-17. ==Distribution== This species was described from the Atlantic coast of the United States.Rudman, W.B., 1999 (Jul 31) Cratena pilata (Gould, 1870) [In] Sea Slug Forum. Australian Museum, Sydney. ==References== Category:Facelinidae Category:Gastropods described in 1870
title: Cratena pilata
